>

</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 553 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Concentrated sap of stinging weeds makes an effective toxin.

**Saving Throw** DC 27 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 8d6 poison damage (1 minute); **Stage 2** 10d6 poison damage (1 minute); **Stage 3** 13d6 poison damage (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
